#labels Phase-Implementation
=User Interface Translation=
This page holds all the words and phrases which need translation in order to create a new UI. Only the word or phrase after the semicolon on each line needs to be translated. The text between brackets to the left on each line is a coded description of where the following phrase appears in the program. About half of the phrases on this page are already translated for you if there is a Firefox translation in your language- which there likely is (see [Locale_Creation]).

NOTES:
  * Special symbols like "%1$S", "%2$S", "%3$S" etc. are place holders for numbers which are supplied when the program is actually run. The symbols can be moved or re-ordered, but the symbols themselves should not be changed.
  * Certain entries may contain HTML tags, like "`<b>`" and "`</b>`". These add formatting to the text. But most entries cannot contain HTML.

[search-window.stop_index_warning_message]: If you stop the indexer, search speed will be slow. \nHowever, you may build the index later if you wish.<br>
[search-help-window.title]: Search Help<br>
[search-help-window.ampersand_description]: Finds verses with both "love" <b>and</b> "God"<br>
[search-help-window.ampersand_example]: love && God<br>
[search-help-window.case_sensitivity_note]: Note: All searches are case insensitive.<br>
[search-help-window.description_heading]: DESCRIPTION<br>
[search-help-window.description_of_search_types]: <span style="font-size:large;">There are four types of searches to choose from after you click the "More" button:</span><br><br>1) <b>Find verses which contain the word(s)</b>: Finds verses that have all of the given words in the verse.<br><br>2) <b>Find verses which contain this exact text</b>: Finds the exact word, part of a word, or phrase, everywhere that it occurs.<br><br>3) <b>Advanced matching using special search terms</b>: You may use the special search terms listed in the table below to build complex searches:<br><br>4) <b>Find verses which contain similar words</b>: Finds verses that contain words similar to those given. This is useful if you don't know exactly how a word is spelled, or to find variations of words. Results can be listed in order of relevance by unchecking "Show results in order".<br><br><br>
[search-help-window.example_heading]: EXAMPLE<br>
[search-help-window.exclamation_description]: Finds verses with "love" but <b>not</b> "God"<br>
[search-help-window.exclamation_example]: love !God<br>
[search-help-window.notes_heading]: NOTES<br>
[search-help-window.parenthesis_description]: Finds verses with "great" <b>or</b> "little" <b>and</b> "love"<br>
[search-help-window.parenthesis_example]: (great || little) && love<br>
[search-help-window.question_mark_description]: Matches "beloved", "unloved" etc.<br>
[search-help-window.question_mark_example]: ??loved<br>
[search-help-window.question_mark_notes]: Can be used anywhere in word<br>
[search-help-window.quotes_description]: Finds verses with the exact phrase "For God so loved"<br>
[search-help-window.quotes_example]: "For God so loved"<br>
[search-help-window.star_description]: Matches any word beginning with "Heav"<br>
[search-help-window.star_example]: Heav*<br>
[search-help-window.star_notes]: Can be used anywhere except at the beginning of a word<br>
[search-help-window.term_heading]: TERM<br>
[search-help-window.tilde_description]: Finds words <b>spelled similarly</b> to "Nebacadnezzer"<br>
[search-help-window.tilde_example]: Nebacadnezzer~<br>
[search-help-window.tilde_notes]: This is useful if you don't know exact spelling of a word<br>
[search-help-window.vertical_bar_description]: Finds verses with either "love" <b>or</b> "God"<br>
[search-help-window.vertical_bar_example]: love || God<br>
[dialog-window.cancel]: Cancel<br>
[dialog-window.no]: &No<br>
[dialog-window.ok]: OK<br>
[dialog-window.save]: &Save<br>
[dialog-window.select]: Select<br>
[dialog-window.yes]: &Yes<br>
[file-chooser.html_title]: HTML Files<br>
[file-chooser.image_title]: Image Files<br>
[file-chooser.text_title]: Text Files<br>
[file-chooser.xml_title]: XML Files<br>
[file-chooser.xul_title]: XUL Files<br>
[error-reporter.dont_show_this_again]: Do not show me this dialog box again.<br>
[error-reporter.error_detection_message]: A problem may have been detected. To report this problem press \"%1$S\".<br>
[splash-secure-window.insert_cdrom]: Please insert the installation CDROM and try again.<br>
